property.name: recovery_enabled
property.description: Auto start enabled or not for this cluster.

property.name: recovery_type
property.description: Auto start type.

property.name: recovery_lifetime_max_count
property.description: Auto start lifetime maximum count of recovery attempt allowed per host component. This is reset when agent is restarted.

property.name: recovery_max_count
property.description: Auto start maximum count of recovery attempt allowed per host component in a window. This is reset when agent is restarted.

property.name: recovery_window_in_minutes
property.description: Auto start recovery window size in minutes.

property.name: recovery_retry_interval
property.description: Auto start recovery retry gap between tries per host component.

property.name: security_enabled
property.description: Hadoop Security

property.name: kerberos_domain
property.description: Kerberos realm.

property.name: ignore_groupsusers_create
property.description: Whether to ignore failures on users and group creation

property.name: smokeuser
property.description: User executing service checks

property.name: smokeuser_keytab
property.description: Path to smoke test user keytab file

property.name: user_group
property.description: Hadoop user group.

property.name: repo_suse_rhel_template
property.description: Template of repositories for rhel and suse.

property.name: repo_ubuntu_template
property.description: Template of repositories for ubuntu.

property.name: override_uid
property.description: Have Ambari manage UIDs

property.name: fetch_nonlocal_groups
property.description: Ambari requires fetching all the groups. This can be slow on envs with enabled ldap. Setting this option to false will enable Ambari, to skip user/group management connected with ldap groups.

property.name: managed_hdfs_resource_property_names
property.description: Comma separated list of property names with HDFS resource paths. Resource from this list will be managed even if it is marked as not managed in the stack

property.name: stack_tools
property.description: Stack specific tools

property.name: stack_features
property.description: List of features supported by the stack

property.name: stack_root
property.description: Stack root folder

property.name: alerts_repeat_tolerance
property.description: The number of consecutive alerts required to transition an alert from the SOFT to the HARD state.
